description: Numbers n such that (sum of base 2 digits of n) = (sum of base 10 digits of n).
comments: A007953(a(n)) = A000120(a(n)); A180018(a(n)) = 0. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 06 2010]n is in the sequence iff n+(-1)^n is in the sequence. [_Robert Israel_, Mar 25 2013]
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: N:= 10000; # to get all elements up to Nselect(x -> (convert(convert(x,base,10),`+`)-convert(convert(x,base,2),`+`)=0), [$0..N]); # _Robert Israel_, Mar 25 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_ Nov 29 2008 at the suggestion of _Zak Seidov_.
